fathima@gmail.com.symptoms: Large, water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems; white moldy growth in humid conditions.
fathima@gmail.com.effects: Can spread rapidly and devastate crops.
fathima@gmail.com.remedy: Use fungicides like chlorothalonil and rotate crops.

fathima@gmail.com.symptoms: Brown concentric rings (target-like spots) on lower leaves.
fathima@gmail.com.effects: Causes defoliation, weakening the plant and reducing fruit production.
fathima@gmail.com.remedy: Remove infected leaves and apply neem oil or copper fungicide.
